about_the_game:
Add a time or mechanical theme to your next dungeon with this Chimera tileset for RPG Maker!

This Chimera Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water tiles
Pale floor with dark edges
Dark floor grate
Patterned floor in orange, green and purple
Paneled floor with metal trim
Large spike tiles
Spike pits
Regular pit
Gear edge
Transparent grate (overlay on other tiles)
Mossy textures in green, purple and orange
Cracks and rocks

Walls:

Wall tiles to match flooring. Includes matching roofs for all wall types.

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
large glowing wall clock
magical-looking window (small)
locked treasure pot (with animated version)
push block
bridge rails
multiple statues – large and small
magic rings
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
random gears for decorating
Matching jewels
plus more!

Events and Animations

Treasure chest and fire in two colors!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
